mapper.sql: a.uuid AS "uuid", a.uid AS "uid", a.symbol AS "symbol", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.order_quantity AS "orderQuantity", a.turnover AS "turnover", a.order_type AS "orderType", a.direction AS "direction", a.price AS "price", a.status AS "status", a.ts AS "ts"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_robot_order a
WHERE a.uuid = #{id} and a.del_flag = 0
